component.name: HomeScene
component.script:
function init() m.tracker=m.top.createChild("TrackerTask") m.NavLabelList = m.top.findNode("NavLabelList") m.albumRowList = m.top.findNode("albumRowList") m.ArtistAlbums = m.top.findNode("ArtistAlbums") m.fullAlbum = m.top.findNode("fullAlbum")
m.NavLabelList.setFocus(true) m.NavLabelList.observeField("itemSelected","onKeyEvent")
m.albumRowList.observeField("rowItemSelected","onCategoryItemSelected")
end function
sub onCategoryItemSelected() print "onCategoryItemSelected" m.albumRowList.visible = false m.fullAlbum.visible = true m.fullAlbum.setFocus(true) end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean if press then
''''''' if back is pushed '''''''' if key = "back"
if m.albumRowList.visible print "you are in nav list" m.fullAlbum.visible = "false" m.albumRowList.visible = "false" m.NavLabelList.visible = "true" m.NavLabelList.setFocus(true) return true
else if m.fullAlbum.visible print "you are in album row list" m.fullAlbum.visible = "false" m.NavLabelList.visible = "false" m.albumRowList.visible = "true" m.albumRowList.setFocus(true) return true
else return false end if '''''END BACK''''''
''''''' OK is pressed '''''''' else if key = "OK" ''''''' if m.NavLabelList.visible ''''''''
if m.NavLabelList.visible print "you are in album row list" m.NavLabelList.visible = "false" m.albumRowList.visible = "true" m.albumRowList.setFocus(true) return true end if if m.albumRowList.visible print "you are in full album" m.albumRowList.visible = "false" m.fullAlbum.visible = "true" m.fullAlbum.setFocus(true) return true end if end if
else return false end if
end function
